content.rendered:
Directed by Prosit Roy

Written by Prosit Roy. Anvita Dutt

Cast Anushka Sharma (Rukhsana). Parambrata Chattopadhyay (Arnab). Rajat Kapoor (Professor). Ritabhari Chakraborty (Piyali). Preeti Sharma (Rubina). Mansi Multani (Kalapori). Dibyendu Bhattacharya (Kanai). Imran Rasheed (Faaris). Mohammed Shakir (Parvez). Aasif Khan (Ismail). Vinod Suryavanshi (Morgue Worker (Local Hospital)). Joydeep Mukherjee (Lawyer). Jagannath Seth (Prahlad). Anshuman Jha (Student). Nisha (Muslim Woman 1 (as Nisha KT)). Shamim Khan (Muslim Woman 2). Pradip Dhar (Taxi Driver (as Prodip Dhar)). Anirban Bhattacharya (Arnab’s Neighbour 1). Soumen Dutta (Arnab’s Neighbour 2 (as Soumin Dutta)). Abhijeet Lahiri (Arnab’s Father (as Abijeet Lahiri)). Mithu Chakraborty (Arnab’s Mother). Usha Nagar (Jamila). Eshika Dey (Parveen). Santilal Mukherjee (Police Officer). Kancha Kari (Constable 1). Manoj Diwakar (Constable 2). Suraj Khatri (Constable 3). Jitendra Shastri (Old Villager). Arijit Dutta (Leader). Happy (Professor’s Grandchild). Sujata Ghosh (Rehabilitation Lady). Sujata Chakraborty (Lift Lady). Rana Basu (Abortion Surgeon). Jayanta Dey (Lift Man). Praveen (Burnt Mark Man). Debabrata (Ifrit). Rwintankar Das (Guard). Rohit KaduDeshmukh (Anrab’s Friend) . Chanda Karanji (Mrs. Prakrashi). Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman). Umair Patel (Musical Artist (archive sound)). Vikash Rajput (Vikash Rajput)

Languages Hindi

Producers Prerna Arora. Rohit Jayaswal. Arjun N. Kapoor. Saurabh Malhotra. Manoj Mittra. Biplab Das Roy. Sushanto Sarkar. Anushka Sharma. Sudip Sharma. Yogiraj Shetty. Iqbal Siddiqui. Karnesh Ssharma. Hitesh Thakkar

Production Clean Slate Film. Clean Slate Film. KriArj Entertainment
